description: A faux-retro shooter in the same vein as Space Invaders

name: Lupin III: Pandora no Isan
description:
A Lupin III action game for the Famicom. It is based somewhat on the movie Castle of Cagliostro.

The game was never released outside Japan.

name: Jubeat Plus
description: iPad version of jubeat released on the Japanese app store in Nov. 2010. Comes with a few free songs but relies on regular updating via an in game shop. New song packs cost 450JPY for 4 songs.

name: Space Cadet
description: A previously unreleased game developed in 1984, Space Cadet later appeared in Game Room on the Xbox Live Arcade.

name: Super Goal!
description: A soccer game from TOSE, which is known as Goal! in the US and Super Cup Soccer in Japan. It's part of the Goal! series of soccer games which originally came out for the NES. Goal! Two is the NES version of this game.

name: World of Darkness
description: The new MMO from CCP, creators of Eve Online, based on the Vampire: The Masquerade setting. The game was officially canceled in April 2014.

name: Beverly Hills Cop
description: A game based on the movie franchise of the same name. Only released in PAL territories despite being based on an American series with an American setting, due to such egregious errors as depicting Axel Foley, originally played by Eddie Murphy, as a white man.

name: Strategic Command Classic: WWI
description: Strategic Command World War I: The Great War is a grand strategy game in the series from award winning game designer Hubert Cater. It is more than just another addition to the Strategic Command series - it is an entire game engine at your fingertips!

name: in Space
description: in Space is a procedural sidescrolling shooter that values precision and strategy over reflex or memorization. Fight through tons of enemies in three different modes, unlock new ships and new weapons. Become the best at shooting two dimensional shapes!

name: Flower and Animal 3D Encyclopedia
description: Sin descripción

name: Fisher-Price: Ready for School - Kindergarten
description: An educational game aimed at Kindergarten aged children.

name: Microsoft Golf 1998 Edition
description: Up to four virtual golfers can play on a choice of four lavish 18-hole golf courses around the world. The backgrounds and players are photo-realistic and the game features many sound effects and voice options.

name: Underground
description: Underground is a unique game that is a potential training tool for surgeons disguised as a puzzle game in which players guide a robot through dangerous mines.

name: Monopoly Family Fun Pack
description:
A new era of Monopoly for home consoles! The Monopoly Family Fun Pack gathers the 3 Monopoly Games:

- Monopoly PLU: the classic Monopoly with a 3D animated board!
- My Monopoly, to create your very own board
- Monopoly Deal, a fast-paced and addictive Monopoly card-game

Enjoy the classic Monopoly in new fun ways, with your friends and people all around the world!

name: Bible Trivia
description: A Bible trivia game featuring questions from the new and old testament. Available for Xbox 360 as an Indie Game.

name: Adventure Quiz: Capcom World - Hatena no Daibouken
description: A PC Engine CD-ROM compilation of the first two Arcade games in the Adventure Quiz/Capcom World series. The player answers questions about Capcom games to further a story.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 12: The Quiz 20000 Mon
description: The Quiz 20000 is a budget-priced quiz game.

name: Slotter Chou Mania: Antonio Inoki ga Genki ni Suru Pachi-Slot Ki
description: If you're playing a virtual slot machine video game on your PlayStation 3, it might as well be one that features popular professional wrestler Antonio Inoki, right?

name: Knockin
description: Sin descripción

name: Police 911
description: An arcade light-gun shooter with a camera to detect player movement, allowing the player to use body movement to hide behind cover and dodge the (slow-moving) bullets. It was the first video game with fairly accurate full-body motion detection, and probably the only one with a motion-controlled cover system.

name: Xwung
description: Described by the author as a shmup without the shooting, xWUNG presents a retro playfield straight from the days of early arcades with vector graphics and chippy tweets and bleeps.

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 9: 2 Nin-uchi Mahjong
description: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 9: 2 Nin-uchi Mahjong is a Japanese Mahjong game for the Nintendo DS.

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 8: Darts
description: Sin descripción

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 2: Shogi
description:
1500DS Spirits Vol. 2: Shogi is a Japanese Shogi game for the Nintendo DS.

For beginners, there is a "Teitei Learning Mode"! In addition to the basic rules, you can also learn how to win.

The "Go Evaluation Quiz" is a fun way for beginners and Shogi lovers to deepen their knowledge, review, and check their skills.

To test your skills, you can also try the mission-clearing 'Challenge Mode' with 15 missions and 45 stages!

You can also play against other players with one software using DS Download Play!

The game features 18 different characters to play against!

name: 1500 DS Spirits Vol. 1: Mahjong
description:
1500DS Spirits Vol. 1: Mahjong is a Japanese Mahjong game for the Nintendo DS.

The game also feature a quiz mode called "Furikomi Quiz" with 110 Questions.

name: Peggle: World of Warcraft Edition
description: Bust pegs in the world of Azeroth with these special World of Warcraft inspired Peggle levels.

name: Brave Knight: Leverant Eiyuuden
description: Japanese raising/dating sim, originally planned for Dreamcast. The game's story deals with the royal Ahfolg family.

name: The Wizard of Oz
description: A SNES platformer loosely based on the movie The Wizard of Oz. The game allows the player to play as all three of Dorothy's friends, as well as Dorothy herself.

name: Titanic Mystery
description: Titanic Mystery is a mystery game where you need to find the bomb and save everyone aboard the ship.

name: Mars Rising
description: A top-down shooter similer to Xevious, exclusive to the Mac OS (classic). Precedes Deimos Rising.

name: Gold Fever
description: Flip coins to make matches while mining across the USA to California in this puzzle game.

name: World of Mixed Martial Arts 2
description: The sequel to Grey Dog Software's MMA simulation game.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam
description: A 2D fighter based on the original Mobile Suit Gundam anime.

name: Outbreak
description: Play as someone from security and you fight off zombies.

name: Privates
description: Privates has you leading a gang of condom-topped marines that dive into various private places to rout a number of sexually transmitted infections.

name: Let's Mangaka DS Style
description: A game based upon working your way up in the manga business. You use the DS to draw pictures.

name: Klix 2
description: The sequel to Klix.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms X with Power Up Kit
description:
"Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅹ with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅹ," which was released in 2004 as the 10th game in the series.
In this release, the all-officer playable advances. In addition to over 3 times the number of events, we have added "Duels," where officers clash with each other, "Debates," in which strategists and ministers clash verbally, "Campaigns," large scale battles involving multiple cities, in order to allow players a greater opportunity to freely experience the world of the Three Kingdoms. In addition, the Power Up Kit adds 4 new scenarios, a "Historical mode," "Trial mode," and an "Expert mode." What's more, Marriages and Births have been included, as well as a chronological table and edit mode.

name: Spellbound 2
description:
Spellbound 2 is the sequel to the highly popular spelling game Spellbound. Once you have honed your spelling skills challenge your friends with a range of exciting new multiplayer games!
Featuring all new and improved single player modes, innovative new mini-games and a great new look and feel, Spellbound 2 tests your spelling skills with 5000 words to master and also features numerous rewards and collectibles to further the gaming experience.

Once you have honed your spelling skills challenge your friends

name: Chromixa
description: Chromixa is a puzzle game focused on combining various smaller shapes together to fill in a larger empty shape.

name: Front Page Sports: Football Pro '95
description: 1995 edition of the popular PC football game developed by Dynamix.

name: Tonzurakko
description: A PSP mini where you are a sea otter who must escape killer whales.

name: Kinnikuman: Muscle Grand Prix Max
description: Sin descripción

name: Evony
description: Evony is an in-browser massive multiplayer online game with gameplay resembling traditional turn-based strategy.

name: Nickelodeon DVD Bingo
description: Play Bingo with Nickelodeon characters

name: thinkSmart
description: A new brain training game from Crave entertainment.

name: Farmtopia
description: A farm sim game

name: ClueFinders 5th Grade Adventures: The Secret of the Living Volcano
description: A sudden tsunami has shipwrecked the ClueFinders on a volcanic island and Owen and Leslie have disappeared! Explore and learn the secrets of the island’s castaways to solve the mystery. Build reading & history, geography & maps, math & fractions, science & circuitry, vocabulary, language arts and more on this perilous journey across the island, under the sea and into the volcano! Then, mastermind a brilliant rescue before the volcano blows!

name: Johnny's Minefield
description: A Xbox Live Indie game developed by Silver Dollar Games.

name: Assault: Retribution
description: Assault: Retribution is a 3D platform shooting game that takes place across seven futuristic levels, includes two playable characters with alternate routes, analog control, and memory card support. You can't spell action, adrenaline or assault with out an "A," so go out and kick a few.

name: Viking Saga: Epic Adventure
description: Discover Viking Saga - Epic Adventure, the next fantastic chapter in the hit action series! Lodin, Dala's greedy father, doesn't approve of the marriage between his daughter and Ingolf.

name: Adelantado Trilogy: Book Three
description:
The story of Adelantado continues in Book Three – get ready for an epic conclusion of this amazing trilogy! 
The sequel starts where the previous part left off. Don Diego finds himself on top of the high cliff...

name: Survival Games
description:
Survival Games is a Multiplayer last man standing survival shooter in an ever-changing world full of secrets, traps, wildlife and treasure. Play in 64 player games over LAN or ONLINE in four different game modes.

Never play the same game twice with a unique world that changes every time you play!

name: Strategic Command Classic: WWI
description: Strategic Command World War I: The Great War is a grand strategy game in the series from award winning game designer Hubert Cater. It is more than just another addition to the Strategic Command series - it is an entire game engine at your fingertips!

name: Dragon Sin
description: A medieval-style fantasy action game themed around dragons. You will know a story about a handsome mercenary, Greer, who is a child of the Dragon Lord. Use his ability to kill many Dark-Dragons.

name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburo: Innocent Black
description: The 8th installment of the Tantei Jinguuji Saburo series, and the first to be developed by WorkJam. Jinguuji is asked to search for a missing daughter from the director of a hospital where he had received treatment. This small case gradually expands to revive a deep and complex mystery.

name: Mobile Suit Z-Gundam
description: The sequel to the 1995 PS1 Mobile Suit Gundam.

name: Disney's Aladdin: Aladdin's Wonders of the World
description: Rescue Princess Jasmine from Jafar while learning important skills.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Master of the Seas
description: Set sail with Pirates of the Caribbean and take your social gaming to a completely new level! Master of the Seas is the first mobile game to combine deep story and brilliant graphics with compelling social gameplay. Become a pirate as you create your ship, build your crew, and embark on quests wrapped around the lore from the Pirates of the Caribbean universe.

name: Pai Touch!
description: Boob touching!

name: Party Fun Pirate
description: A WiiWare game based on the children's toy Pop-Up Pirate. Shove swords in a barrel, and the one to touch the captain loses. ARG!

name: Happy Bakery
description: A bakery simulation aimed at younger children.

name: Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! Squid Harder!
description: Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! Squid Harder! is an arena shooter created by Robert D. Fearon. It was inspired by many other arena shooters.

name: Sudoku Master
description: A Sudoku game for the DSiware

name: Skwug
description: A community game released on Xbox Live. It is about a blue sphere with enormous eyes that can teleport.

name: Skip Beat!
description: Based on the manga of the same name.

name: Badaboo
description: Badaboo

name: Perfect Pinball
description:
The pack features content of three previous games:

- Pinball Dreams (1993): Ignition, Steel Wheels, Beat Box, Nightmare

- Pinball Dreams 2 (1994): Safari, Revenge of the Robot Warriors, Stall Turn, Neptune

- Pinball Fantasies (1994): Partyland

name: Tsumu
description: Tsumu is 3D puzzle game where the player, as a hamster, uses a forklift to construct different images.

name: Sex
description: The game with such a simple, yet expressive title is also rather simple and to-the-point in its concept: it is about having sex with sexy members of the opposite sex in several sexy styles, situations, settings, and scenes.

name: Devil Summoner: Kuzunoha Raidou tai Abaddon Ou Plus
description: A compilation of Devil Summoner: Raidou Kuzunoha versus King Abaddon and Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne Maniacs Chronicle Edition, an enhanced version of Nocturne Maniacs, which itself was an enhanced version of the original game.

name: Judge
description: Game and Watch game from the original 1980 silver series that was re-released as a Nintendo DSi Virtual console game

name: Paradise Lost
description: Paradise Lost is an arcade game based on Far Cry: Instincts

name: Thorium Wars
description: DSi Ware title by 3PM Games and published by Big John Games.

name: Half-Life 2: Episode Three
description:
A cancelled sequel to Half-Life 2: Episode Two.

The project was cancelled due to Valve scrapping the episodic releases as they wanted to make more ambitious full games.

If this is released, it would be under the name Half-Life 3.

name: Half-Life 2: Survivor
description: An Arcade version of Half Life 2 that was only released in Japan and is missing many plot elements from the PC version.

name: Rugby
description:
Rugby (known Rugby 2001 in the European PC version) is the 2000 installment of Electronic Arts' Rugby video game series.

The game was developed by Creative Assembly and published by EA Sports. The game is EA Sports' first rugby union game on Microsoft Windows and PlayStation 2, and was succeeded by Rugby 2004

name: Pixel Man
description: An Xbox Live Indie game that experiments with a minimalist art style, with 30 levels for players to complete with no checkpoints at all.

name: Little Master: Nijiiro no Maseki
description: Turn-based strategy RPG developed by Tokuma Shoten in 1995. It is the third and final game in the Little Master trilogy.

name: Deep Space Waifu: Flat Justice
description: This game is a stand alone expansion of the deep space waifu series! A casual strip 'em up action game! Destroy alien colonies and do some cloth damage in giant girls! Now bear king will join the cops to discover the perfect waifu amidst explosions! The police will be watching!

name: World Tour Soccer: Challenge Edition
description: World Tour Soccer Challenge Edition is a PSP game developed by Sony Computer Entertainment London Studio. It was published by Sony in North America and Europe.

name: DarkEden
description: A Hack & Slash MMORPG.

name: X Scooter
description: A Scooter based sports game developed by ValuSoft, Inc. Your objective is to collect 20 circles within a given time period in order to advance to new areas.

name: Toy Golf
description: Toy Golf is a fantasy golf game for the Gizmondo.

name: Pocket Ping Pong 2005
description: Pocket Ping Pong 2005 for the Gizmondo

name: JumpStart Advanced Preschool: StoryLand
description: JumpStart Advanced Preschool Storyland is a PC game released in 2011. It is designed to teach language arts concepts at a preschool level.

name: JumpStart Advanced Preschool
description: JumpStart Advanced Preschool is a game that was originally released in 2002, then titled Jumpstart Advanced Preschool. It has since been released alongside other JumpStart Advanced Preschool games. It is intended to teach a preschool curriculum.

name: Strategery
description: Turn-based world domination strategy game for the iPhone.

name: Pub Darts
description: Pub Darts

name: Ground Effect
description:
The title was developed exclusively for the iPhone and iPod Touch and utilizes the platform’s trademark accelerometer as well as touch controls.

Ground Effect is a unique 3D, classic arcade-style racer, inspired by ekranoplan technology wherein craft ‘fly’ on a cushion of air at breakneck speeds and It boasts amazing graphics and incredibly smooth frame-rates as well as a host of gameplay features.

name: The Amazing Brain Train!
description: Sin descripción

name: New Star Tennis
description: A tennis game with detailed career mode and life management

name: Sword & Poker
description: A poker-based RPG for the iPhone.

name: Alive 4-Ever
description: With a naming scheme blatantly stolen from Left 4 Dead, Alive 4-Ever is a dual joystick shooter where the player controls a survivor of the zombie apocalypse.

name: Arkedo Series: 03 Pixel!
description: Pixel is a reto style 2D platformer. The player plays the role of Pixel cat, whose task is to go through several stages in order to collect treasures and save his own world.

name: Firepit
description: Firepit is fighting game where two flying gladiators throw swords at each other until one of them loses all his life.

name: Domino Rally
description: If you’re after a game with unique gameplay and a very definite visual style then Domino Rally will fit the bill perfectly. An original action-platform game created by Japanese developers Success, Domino Rally gives to the player the challenge of helping the local townsfolk who are in trouble.

name: Puzzle Shuffle
description: A game for the Commodore 64.

name: Newtonica2
description: The second game in the newtonica series for the iPhone. Physics based puzzler set in space, starring a rubber duckie.

name: Father Christmas
description: Father Christmas is an adventure game based on the children's book of the same name

name: Finger Frenzy World
description: Finger Frenzy World for the iPhone

name: Beat the Intro
description: The ultimate music quiz game

name: Moki Moki!
description: Puzzle game for wiiware

name: Jet X2O
description: As a professional watercraft rider roaring through expansive levels, you can become the envy of all the other racers. You know you're good when you can race one of your highly stylized watercraft through raging rivers, turbulent rapids, tall waterfalls, and hairpin turns. In Jet X2O, you'll travel to far-off lands such as Atlantis, the Arctic, and humid South American jungles, and compete against competitors ready for the challenge. This is not just a race of speed, but a test of extreme trick skill.

name: Cocoto Kit For Kids
description: An educational iPhone game for kids starring Cocoto

name: Mystery Legends: Sleepy Hollow
description: Discover the secrets of Sleepy Hollow and the legendary Headless Horseman in this haunted hidden object game. Investigate the freakish residents and witness their fate at the hands of the Headless Horseman.

name: Infinity City
description: Infinity City is a hillarious math romp with everyone's favourite educational cartoon bunch, The Gigglebone Gang.

name: Get Backers Dakkanoku: Ura Shinjuku Saikyou Battle
description: GetBackers Dakkanya: Urashinshiku Saikyou Battle is a role-playing video game was released for the PlayStation 2 on April 29, 2004 in Japan only, Developed by KCEJ and Published by Konami. It is the seventh and final game based on the manga and anime of same name.

name: Ghost Mansion Party
description: Ghost Mansion Party for WiiWare

name: PictureBook Games: The Royal Bluff
description: PictureBook Games: The Royal Bluff for DSiWare

name: Ultra Yon-nin Mahjong
description: Mahjong game developed by Tsukumo in 1982.

name: Princess Party Camellia
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Taketori Monogatari
description: Adventure game developed by Cross Media Soft in 1984.

name: Rugby League Challenge
description: A rugby game for PSP

name: KuruKuru Princess: Tokimeki Figure Mezase! Vancouver
description: The third game in the KuruKuru Princess series.

name: Sanctum
description: An online card RPG game released in 1998 for the PC.

name: Billionaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Skeletter med kasketter
description: Sin descripción

name: Giften
description: Sin descripción

name: Ford Simulator 5.0
description:
A greatly updated version of the classic Ford Simulator with the newest Ford models.

You can see the Tech Specifications or just drive.

Your Objective is arrive at the Lake Wakatonka.

The cars' performance is realistically modeled; it's not so easy to drive in high speeds and in curves.

name: Formula 1 Masters
description: Sin descripción

name: Accelerator
description:
Accelerator, an addictive car racing game by The Vision Factory, 1997. 
 
Accelerator had the most protracted development cycle of any CD-i game. It was initially written by a student Ben Sugden on a working vacation to SPC Vision. He designed the core concept of the game but left it in an unfinished state when his vacation was out. The game was developed on and off by various SPC staff until finally during the summer of 1994 a testing version was sent to PIMC. This came back with numerous bugs which remained unfixed until Michael Hildenborg was contracted to produce a fixed version which was completed towards the end of 1995. The game was sent to PIMC and returned again with new bugs, since there was no publisher and no great hurry Accelerator was shelved for more than a year. Finally the game was finished and released in 1997 by SPC Vision.

name: Alfapet
description: An early regional CD-i release to Sweden with what looks to be a conversion of the popular board game scrabble.

name: Arcade Classics
description:
Namco compilation, consisting of three games. Galaxian, Galaga and Ms Pacman.

Conversions of three Namco classics including Galaxian, Ms Pac-man and Galaga. NAMCO took special interest in this project even though they weren't directly involved with the development of the CD-i version, the quality of the Intellectual Property had to be maintained. This went as far as the packaging itself which is detailed in the below Suggestive Themes boxout. Philips ADS were given a Pac-man arcade board with the chipset for Ms Pac-man to wire up so they had everything to do a decent conversion. It wasn't a straight port however, the entire game was upgraded to a 256 colour palette and also extra levels were added courtesy of Johnny Wood and authorised by NAMCO.

name: Axis & Allies
description: A WWII real-time-strategy game based on the popular board game and Timegate Studios previous game series, Kokan.

name: Axis & Allies
description: Axis & Allies is an adaptation of the Risk-like board game centred around World War II.

name: Battleship
description: Battleship is a conversion of the classic board game for the CD-i. The game plays exactly like the original board game. You take turns to fire on certain coordinates in the hope of hitting enemy ships. On the side of the screen there's a little window that shows short naval archive footage whenever you are firing or get hit. You can play against the computer or against a friend.

name: Backgammon
description: Sin descripción

name: CD Shoot
description: CD Shoot is a clay dove shooting game for the CD-i. The game has four game modes: sporting, Olympic trap, balltrap and English skeet. In the game clay doves are launched in the air and using a targeting crosshair you have to shoot them out of the sky.

name: Cluedo
description:
"Professor Plum...in the kitchen...with a candlestick." For decades, CLUE has been one of the world's most popular detective games. Now the celebrated murder mystery comes to life with live actors, sensational video and the powers of interactive investigation.

Mr. Boddy has been found murdered in the mansion. Your job is to be the first to discover the killer, the lethal weapon and the room in which the deadly deed was done.

name: De Zaak Van Sam
description:
You are private detective Sam D. Philips and your job is to find Monica, the beautiful wife of Mafia boss Antonio Baresi.
You make the decisions in this interactive detective. But be careful, every mistake can be fatal!

name: Domino
description: Domino is a digital conversion of the classical tile laying game of Dominoes. Each rectangular tile has a number of dots on both long ends. In turns players place one of their tiles on the table. Tiles must connect to evenly numbered edges. The first player to lose all his tiles wins the game. When the player can't place any of his tiles he has to pass.

name: Do you remember the '60s?
description: Do You Remember the 60's?, is an interactive quiz based on 1960's popular culture.

name: Dragon's Lair
description:
Dragon's Lair is an interactive game originally created by Don Bluth.

Dirk the Daring, is on a quest to rescue the fair Princess Daphne from the clutches of the infamous Singe, the fire-breathing dragon. Battle your way with the valiant knight, as he finds his way through the castle of Mordroc, a dark wizard, who has enchanted it with treacherous monsters and obstacles. In the mysterious caverns below the castle, your odyssey continues against the evil forces that oppose your efforts to reach the Dragon's Lair Lead on Adventurer, your Quest awaits!

name: Toy Story 3
description: Get in on the game. Play as Buzz or Woody as you use your phonics skills to move your way around this interactive board game and compete in 16 challenging missions. Works with the Leapster Explorer and LeapPad Explorer systems.

name: My Big Sister
description:
My name is Luzia...and this story isn't about me, but my sister.

Play as Luzia in her quest to return home. After Luzia and her older sister Sombria are abducted by strangers, it is up to Luzia to help her and her sister home.

name: Pipes Racer
description: Racing game with Time Attack events through pipes. Avoid obstacles and lasers.

name: Jankyou
description: Mahjong game developed by Hudson Soft in 1983.

name: Chinbu's Adventure
description: A collectathon action rpg where you play as a young dragon named Chinbu with the unique ability to control all elements.

name: Disassembly Line
description: Remote control a robot into the evil robot factory to take on the artificial intelligence in combat. Upgrade your robot by collecting add-ons that give you awesome abilities. Play together with your friends to stand a chance!

name: McRogue
description: It's man versus machine in this action roguelite from Snare Games. Explore procedural worlds, collect power-ups, and use McRogue's devastating robot fists to destroy all that stand in his way. But don't take too long about it - the robots only get stronger.

name: ManaRocks
description: ManaRocks is an online strategy card game that allows you to combine any cards from six colors of mana, each one with its own hero, skills and effects. Use strategy and imagination to create your decks and battle games in 1v1 and 2v2 modes.

name: Bright low
description: A first-person shooter.

name: Front Defense Heroes
description:
Front Defense: Heroes, the newest update to Fantahorn’s smash hit Front Defense, brings teammates together with you to most fierce war in human history -World War II.
Front Defense: Heroes is a multiplayer VR shooting game set in WWII and can support up to 5 VS 5 online battle.
Front Defense: Heroes delivers the most immersive war experience, using classic WWII weapons in life-like battlefield atmospheres.

name: TrainerVR
description:
TrainerVR is a unique physics-based VR train construction game.
In TrainerVR you can create from simple tracks to an elaborate rail network, just like the wooden piece game, but to the infinity and beyond.
If you liked building with your own bare hands, you’ll feel the same in our limitless VR world.

name: Alien Invaders from the Planet Plorth
description: Alien Invaders from the Planet Plorth is a shooter game in which the player moves sideways trying to dodge enemy bullets.

name: Last Day of Fear
description: Last Day of Fear - the game tells the story about a detective for the County of Rayna. He was not an easy task to deal with the difficult situation. Near highway 66 was the house where it was quite numerous suicide and murder.

name: Anime Girls VR
description:
Meet kind anime girls and dance with them to the cool songs. All this inside anime styled locations!
Anime Girls VR will let you feel presence of characters like they would be next to you. Prepare for the great effort if you want to keep up with the girls!

name: Sok
description: Sok is a sokoban classic puzzle game. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. It's not as easy as it seems. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off.

name: Cold Cuts
description: Test your skills with a samurai blade and cut objects that will require speed, precision, and accuracy!We will have this game available for purchase in the near future!

name: Technotron Defense
description: Techotron Defense is a stylish tower defense game with relaxing soundtrack and deep and hardcore tower defense gameplay

name: The Last Vampire
description: The Last Vampire is a colorful 2D platformer.

name: Virtual Reality Girls 2
description:
Virtual Reality Girls 2 is experience which will let you feel like real millionaire, delighted fast car and living inside amazing apartment. All this with company of the beautiful girls.

Thanks to perfectly mapped motions of women body using motion capture technology and high quality 3d models we managed to deliver realistic experience of being with women. If you need some rest you can relax and watch one of the beautiful girls dancing.

name: Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection
description:
Over 60 characters, 40 million units sold, and 30 years later, we’re celebrating Street Fighter with the Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection for PlayStation 4!

The Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection contains 12 iconic titles in the series that each have their place in Street Fighter history.

The Switch release includes an exclusive variant of Super Street Fighter II: Super Street Fighter II: The Tournament Battle.

name: The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game
description: Choose your Heroes, build your deck and face the dark forces of Sauron in The Lord of the Rings Adventure Card Game. Battle Uruks, spiders, orcs, and more as you journey through the world of Tolkein's fantasy, earning cards and devising new tactics along the way. Armed with your fully customizable 30-card deck, you will lead a band of three heroes through campaigns reaching the darkest corners of Middle-earth. Guide your own fellowship through quests that will test your leadership, tactics, knowledge, and spirit.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 - Deluxe Edition
description: The deluxe edition of One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 for Nintendo Switch that includes the 42 pieces of DLC that were released for the PlayStation 3, 4, and Vita.

name: Fast Rolling
description:
In this game, you have to pass different levels while controlling the ball. Each level contains various obstacles and elements which make the playing process harder. 
Obstacles are perfectly varied, both static and dynamic.

name: Fading
description: Traverse the mind of a troubled man in a minimalist 2D adventure.

name: Welcome Back to 2007
description:
Would you say that 2007 cannot be returned?
But we will try to retrieve 2007 once again!
After 11 long years, 2007 are coming back to us!
We will return all of these missing things! Be ready for blazer, skeletons, emo hairstyle, tears and other sorrows!
WBT2007 is a old-school platformer game.

name: Pokémon Battrio
description:
Pokémon Battrio is an arcade video game that was announced on April 11, 2007 and released on November 21, 2007 in Japan. The video game requires players to move certain tazos with Pokémon on a grid. The video game is made for two-player multiplayer, where players will fight against other Pokémon. Each player can use up to three Pokémon. It is the first heavily edited Pokémon title for arcades.

This video game was not released internationally outside of Japan. Due to its popularity, a new version called Battrio: V was made, which, as its name says, contains Pokémon of the fifth generation.

name: Rocky
description:
If you are a lover of strong emotions and want to win the World Champion Cup, you will have to calm your nerves and face CIMBEL-LIN, TED MATARE, JANSEN SINO and FIGHTER BULL.

Three-dimensional simulation of a boxing match, fight against CIMBEL-LIN, TED MATARE, JANSEN SINO and FIGHTER BULL to win the world title.

name: Bocce
description: Bocce is a video game based on the Italian sport of the same name.

name: Thwocker
description: An unfinished Atari 2600 game that was later released as part of various Atari game collections and Microsoft's Game Room. The player controls a small man (or creature?) that does not stop rhythmically bouncing, though the player can control the height of the jumps. The object is to collect the correct musical note, displayed at the bottom of the screen, while avoiding floating musical instruments. Once the correct notes have been collected, a large note must be acquired near the top of the level. Grabbing that large note starts a song, during which the player can collect the remaining musical notes and instruments on screen for extra points.

name: Nick Carter: Il Mistero del Tesoro Degli Incaz!
description: A licensed adventure game from Italy.

name: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill: Slaps and Beans
description: Bud Spencer and Terence Hill in their first virtual adventure. Slaps And Beans is a co-operative or single player scrolling beat’ em up game with the addition of platform elements and mini-games in which you'll interpret the characters of Bud Spencer and Terence Hill

name: Tetropunk
description: The classic arcade is back in a new style! It's time to prove that you are one of the best!

name: Gadget Tycoon
description:
You are the proud owner of a derelict factory — and your very own company! Invest in R&D, learn the basics of Sales and Marketing, motivate your employees and start selling wacky products: futuristic latrines, roller-blades and android home helps!

Target your consumers and anticipate their every desire. Tame the emotives by providing designer products that will flatter their image! Lure the techies with the latest in modern technology!

And if that isn't enough, use means that measure up to your ambition: spy on your competition and steal their latest inventions, sabotage their machines and drain away their brains, sue them dry for espionage and get the IRS on their backs! Beware though... your competition will not hesitate to form an unholy alliance with the underworld to bring about your demise.

name: Brickbuster
description: Sin descripción

name: Birthright: The Gorgon's Alliance
description: Birthright: Gorgon's Alliance is a hybrid wargame sim/first-person 3D RPG for PC CD-ROM released in 1996, based on the moderately popular "Birthright" D&D campaign.

name: Fallout Online
description: Other than the fact that it was supposed to be an MMO game set in the popular Fallout-universe, very little was known about Fallout Online. It was canceled in January 2012.

name: Space Quest I: Roger Wilco in the Sarien Encounter
description: Space Quest 1: The Sarien Encounter is an old DOS science fiction adventure game, developed by Sierra On-Line, designed by Mark Crowe - Scott Murphy and published by Sierra On-Line in 1986. It's available for download. Space Quest 1: The Sarien Encounter is also part of the Space Quest series.

name: I Dig It
description:
"I Dig It" from InMotion.

The player must manage fuel, temperature, and damage while searching for treasures. The treasures can be sold at the farmhouse to earn cash with which to pay the mortgage, upgrade the digger, or make repairs. The game is played using the on-screen “analog” joystick, or touch-screen to control digger movement.

Aside from the free play mode there are eight mini-game challenge matches. The iPad version includes a level editor.

name: Overlords
description: A game for the ZX Spectrum.

name: Overlord
description: Overlord is a space-based strategy game designed by David Perry & Nick Bruty. The goal of the game was to compete with an alien opponent to colonize a solar system.

name: Syndicate Plus
description:
Syndicate is Bullfrog’s masterpiece of a game in which you aren’t saving the world or protecting innocents. You just make sure that your employers get what they want. At your disposal are four cyborg agents, an impressive arsenal of weapons and gadgets, and a massive selection of cybernetic upgrades. You are free to unleash this power on a highly interactive map where you can blow up buildings, steal cars, light trees on fire, or just shoot stuff. Produced by Peter Molyneux himself, Syndicate is the essence of cyberpunk and, with its great music, stylized visuals, and mind-blowing atmosphere, it has earned its place among the best games of all time.

The "Plus" release includes both the original base game and the American Revolt expansion pack.

name: Oblivion
description: A action game developed by Simon Morris and published by Alpha-Omega Software for ZX Spectrum.

name: Mass Effect Datapad
description: Companion Game for Mass Effect 3, released on iOS, it has since been discontinued, but is still available in a browser based version at Bioware's N7 HQ website.

name: Janggun-ui Adeul
description: Janggun-ui Adeul is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up based on the Korean film of the same name.

name: The Elder Scrolls Travels: Oblivion
description: An RPG originally in the works for the Playstation Portable to be released in 2007, but has since been presumed on hold, or even canceled, since no more information has been revealed.

name: Power Boat GT
description: Motorboat racing game.

name: Scream 4
description: Timed to the release of the film, Scream 4 and Scream 4 HD are available for the iPhone and iPad, respectively.

name: Portal of Evil: Stolen Runes
description: A hidden object game from 8 Floor Games.

name: Dune: The Battle for Arrakis
description: The completely overhauled Mega Drive version of Dune, including new graphics, new features, new levels, technology tree changes and streamlined controls.

name: Hidden & Dangerous: Action Pack
description:
Hidden & Dangerous
The year is 1941. Your special forces team has been shot down deep inside enemy territory and it's now reliant on your cunning and tactical thinking to get them safely across the border. The odds are stacked against you. Have you got what it takes?

Hidden & Dangerous: Fight for Freedom
In 1941, Captain David Stirling gathered an elite group of soldiers and founded what was to become one of the most powerful Special Forces agencies in the world--the British Special Air Services. Only the strongest, swiftest, and most daring were allowed to join the SAS; their bravery in battle was second to none. Now YOU can become a member of the SAS! Hidden & Dangerous: Fight for Freedom adds new missions and campaigns to Hidden & Dangerous.

name: Assassin's Creed: Multiplayer Rearmed
description: Assassin's Creed multiplayer top down perspective game for iOS devices.

name: Warcraft II: The Dark Saga
description: Warcraft II: The Dark Saga is the console version of Warcraft II: Tides of Darkness and its expansion built on. It is the same as the original product but with new features.

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Una Aventura de Cine
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Wars: Galaxies - Starter Kit
description: This is a bundle that includes the original Star Wars: Galaxies game, as well as its expansions "Jump to Light Speed" and "Rage of the Wookies." It is the initial physical release since the dreaded "New Game Experience" updates. Noteworthy changes include a complete redesign of the first 30 character levels, which now serve as both a tutorial and a continuous quest line. Additionally, the number of profession choices has been reduced to nine by merging some characters.

name: Loopz
description:
Loopz is a puzzle video game originally designed and programmed by Ian Upton for the Atari ST in 1989. He previously worked as head game designer for Audiogenic, who acquired exclusive rights to the game, then in 1990 arranged for Mindscape to publish it for computers in North America and consoles worldwide.

The Nintendo Entertainment System version (programmed by Bits Studios) and the Game Boy version (programmed by Argonaut Software) were released in 1990. Audiogenic published versions of the original game for the Acorn Electron, BBC Micro, ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Commodore 64, Atari ST, Amiga, and IBM PC in 1990 and 1991.
A German political simulation of the 1990 reunification process, developed by Neudelsoft in 1990.

name: The Sims 2: Super Collection
description: In The Sims 2, your Sims will be more lifelike, more responsive, and more complex than ever before. The Sims 2: Super Collection is a Mac-exclusive edition of The Sims 2 that includes a copy of the base game The Sims 2, plus six expansion packs (University, Nightlife, Open for Business, Pets, Seasons, and Bon Voyage) and three stuff packs (Family Fun Stuff, Glamour Life Stuff, and Happy Holiday Stuff).

name: 3D Golden Warrior
description: 3D Golden Warrior is a 3D dungeon adventure game featuring true vector graphics.

name: Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego?: Deluxe Edition
description:
Rehash of Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego?, featuring high-resolution VGA graphics, digitized sound effects, and new locations.

The life cycle is self-explanatory: sign up for a case, travel between locations questioning witnesses, obtain warrants, and make arrests, and you have approximately a week to do so. The options you can do in each location are the same: you can question witnesses, look up evidence reports, or contact Crime Net to receive additional information about the suspect such as features, hair and eye color, auto, and sport. If you're lucky, you can contact other informants like Bart Samson and Vinnie the Squealer.

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 2: Time Twister
description:
Time Twister is the second expansion pack to the game RollerCoaster Tycoon 2, and is based on a time theme, exploring various time periods. The expansion pack offers many new themed rides, scenery items, and scenarios.

Much like with Wacky Worlds, this pack was also criticized for its lack of new gameplay options or new rides, since the rides included in the expansion pack are merely re-designs of previously available rides.

name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Operation Resurrection
description:
Operation Resurrection is the PlayStation 2 version of the Return to Castle Wolfenstein with some added extras that make it it's own unique game. Next to the full, original singleplayer campaign, there are 7 new prologue levels that show how B.J. and Agent One first met and how they got captured and imprisoned at Wolfenstein Castle. There is also a secret bonus awarded at the end of every level when every secret area has been found.

Unlike Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Tides of War there is no multiplayer support - internet and multi link.

name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Tides of War
description: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Tides of War is an updated re-release for the Xbox based on the original PC version Return to Castle Wolfenstein. Next to the full, original singleplayer campaign, there are 7 new prologue levels that show how B.J. and Agent One first met and how they got captured and imprisoned at Wolfenstein Castle. There is also a secret bonus awarded at the end of every level when every secret area has been found.

name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert Mobile
description: C&C: Red Alert for the iPhone is based on Red Alert 3, but is mostly its own game with unique touchscreen controls.

name: Anno 1503: Royal Edition
description: This compilation contains the main game 1503 A.D. and its add-on 1503 A.D.: Treasures, Monsters and Pirates.

name: Block Wars
description: A Breakout variation played with two players

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Lost Alpha
description: Lost Alpha is a total remake of the old unreleased alpha build(s) of STALKER Shadow of Chernobyl.

name: Funky Fantasy
description: An RPG with comedic elements, released only in Japan.

name: Super Mario Bros. / Duck Hunt / World Class Track Meet
description: A three-in-one cartridge containing the original Super Mario Bros., Duck Hunt, and World Class Track Meet.

name: Super Mario Bros. Special
description: Super Mario Bros. Special was the second Nintendo-licensed follow-up to Super Mario Bros., released around two months after Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels. While superficially very similar to the original Super Mario Bros., the game features original new levels and has a screen-by-screen scrolling mechanism. The most significant difference is that it features none of the original levels, since the eight worlds are all unique to this release and have a high level of difficulty surpassing even Super Mario Bros. 2.

name: FastCrawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Heroes of Might and Magic Online
description: Heroes of Might and Magic Online is an MMORPG that combines the classic elements of HoMM III with the updated graphics of HoMM V to present a unique gameplay.

name: Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel
description: Get Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel, Adventure game for PSP, PSVita console from the official PlayStation website.

name: LEGO Racers & LEGO Racers 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Fantasy III
description:
Final Fantasy III is the third FF game for the Famicom. The turn-based battle engine has been improved: if the enemy is defeated, the next character will automatically switch to another enemy, and not hit the air, like in the previous two games.

The game itself is, like the previous games, a top-down RPG where your characters travel in the overworld, sometimes entering cities and dungeons to buy equipment, rest and fight random encounters and bosses with turn-based combat. Final Fantasy III also introduces various series staples, such as the Job system and the Moogle species.

name: Fengse Huanxiang 4: Shengzhan de Zhongyan
description:
**This game is playable in Chinese only**

This installment of Fengse Huanxiang (Wind Fantasy) series is connected plot-wise to its predecessor, and is set in the same fantasy world and time line. The war between the countries of Ice and Fire devastated both those states, and Karin Seraphim, the white-haired leader of the special unit "Sin-Breaking Wings", found herself and her best friend in the opposite camps. Now, with the rulers of both countries dead, the war is finally over. However, there is a new disturbance in the Dragon Tomb. The Holy City of Nilu sends the priestess Niyi to investigate the matter. And when the young woman arrives at the tomb, she finds demons there... is this the beginning of a new war?

name: Batman Forever
description: The PC version of Batman Forever

name: Empire: Total War - Downloadable Content Collection
description:
Empire: Total War - Downloadable Content Pack contains the following five downloadable content packs (DLCs) for Empire: Total War:

- The Warpath Campaign (a new campaign featuring an expanded battlefield and five new, playable Indian factions)
- Elite Units of the East (adds 12 new elite units to the Maratha and Ottoman factions)
- Elite Units of the West (adds 14 new elite units to all the major Western factions
- Elite Units of the America (adds 15 new elite units to the American, British and French factions)
- Special Forces (adds 9 new elite units to various factions)

It requires Empire: Total War base game.

In addition to the above the retail version features a Bonus Disc with trailers, concept art, screenshots and more.

name: Tattoo Mania
description: Tattoo mania is an iPhone game from Handy Games. Players trace tattoo patterns, earning points for accuracy.

name: Mouse Trap / Operation / Simon
description: Triple pack Gameboy Advance, Mouse Trap / Operation / Simon

name: Marine Sharpshooter
description: The hit PC sniper series comes to the the iPhone

name: Space Trek
description: As Captain Jay, you take control of a space jet deployed on an alien world.

name: Miami Vice
description: Playing as Sonny Crockett and Ricardo Tubbs, the buddy-cop duo from the 80's TV series of the same name, fight to take down a drug ring led by Manuel Ortega in this third-person shooter.

name: Capcom Fighting All-Stars
description:
Originally, Capcom Fighting All-Stars was planned to be a 2D sequel to Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001, before being converted to 3D. However, due to SNK's financial troubles and restructuring, the title was redesigned as a Capcom-only crossover with twenty former SNK members designing it, using the models previously built for the original title.

Like SNK's KOF: Maximum Impact games, it was designed to translate a 2D fighting game series into 3D. This was done previously in the Street Fighter EX series, which Capcom co-produced with Arika.

Capcom beta-tested the game, but after negative feedback from players and more months in development, the game was canceled in August 2003.

According to an interview with former The King of Fighters director Toyohisa Tanabe, a secret character from Tanabe's old company (SNK) was set to be playable in Capcom Fighting All Stars.. While not confirmed, the figure bears a heavy resemblance to K' or Kyo Kusanagi.

name: Godzilla
description:
Godzilla is a 1988 action video game for the Commodore 16 and Commodore Plus/4 developed by Attila Cosir and distributed by Novotrade and then re-released by DELTASoft. It is a simple, endless game of avoiding taking hits from obstacles and enemies in a scrolling field. The first level introduces ground spikes, which can be jumped over. The second level introduces a UFO-like object that flies toward Godzilla's head, which can be eaten. The third level introduces a giant bee that heads toward the back of Godzilla's head, and is defeated by using fire breath. Finally, the fourth level introduces a space shuttle-like object that cruises on the ground, which can be jumped over. 
 
Godzilla has 6 lives, and once they're gone the player has to start over. The game awards points for keeping Godzilla alive, however it doesn't keep track of high scores. 
 
The game itself is completely silent, save for a brief voice sample when the game is started, and a loud, static-filled roar that Godzilla utters whenever he gets hit by an object.

name: Das Auge des Horus
description: Sin descripción

name: Lethal Enforcers I & II
description: Lethal Enforcers I & II contains the Konami coin-op shooters Lethal Enforcers & Lethal Enforcers II: Gunfighters both on one disc. The games both share a similar gameplay structure with digitized enemy targets "popping up" on screen and simply needing to be shot down before they take a shot at you.The original game places you as a 1990s police officer fighting bank robbers, Chinese Mafia and drug dealers while in the sequel you are now a Sheriff up against more bank robbers and wrong doing but now set in the Old West. Lethal Enforcers can be played with either a standard game pad or for more of an authentic arcade experience, the Konami Hyperblaster light gun.

name: Counter-Strike Online
description: Counter-Strike Online is a first-person shooter video game, targeted towards Asia's gaming market released in 2008. It is based on Counter-Strike and was developed by Nexon with oversight from license-holder Valve. It uses a micropayment model that is managed by a custom version of Steam.

name: TacOps
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Heroes: Ultimate Mission
description: Dragon Ball Heroes: Ultimate Mission is a card-based fighting game that is a portable port of the arcade game Dragon Ball Heroes.

name: Simon the Sorcerer's Puzzle Pack
description: Simon the Sorcerer's Puzzle Pack is a collection of small puzzle games that go around the Simon the Sorcerer's theme. Jumble - A new type of sliding tile puzzle - rearrange the pieces in a constantly changing animation!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution: The Last Standalone
description: A standalone version of the "The Last Stand" mode in Dawn of War II: Retribution.

name: The Silent Hill Experience
description: The Silent Hill Experience is an interactive UMD Video created specifically for PlayStation Portable. It combines a variety of comics, musics and movies to deliver a complete behind-the-scenes look at the franchise.

name: Silent Hill: Play Novel
description: Silent Hill: Play Novel is an adaptation of the original Silent Hill for Game Boy Advance in the form of visual novel. It was only released in Japan, but the game has been translated and adapted into different ports by fans. Silent Hill: Play Novel is an interactive story: at certain moments the player is asked to choose between two or more possible options, which can affect the rest of the story. Besides the narration, the game features some puzzles and multiple endings.

name: Batman: Arkham City Lockdown
description: A spin-off game titled Batman: Arkham City Lockdown was developed by NetherRealm Studios for iOS and was released on December 7, 2011. Taking place before Arkham City, the game sees players using touchscreen controls to fight enemies one-on-one, including villains such as Two-Face, Solomon Grundy, Joker, and the mercenary Deathstroke. Defeating enemies earns points that can be used to upgrade Batman's stats or unlock gadgets or costumes.

name: TwinStick: This Ain't No Picnic
description: Touted as a "true twin stick" shooter, TwinStick: This Ain't No Picnic puts players in control of two characters simultaneously.

name: Ibn al-Nafis Visual Novel
description: The Arabic story, Ibn al-Nafis Visual Novel, is the first visual novel with real, historical Arabic themes.

name: F.E.A.R. Combat
description: F.E.A.R. Combat is a standalone multiplayer component based on F.E.A.R. but released for free less than a year after the original game. F.E.A.R. already had full multiplayer options, but this component allows everyone to join the online battles, without needing to buy the game. It includes 22 multiplayer maps, 10 game modes, all the weapons and updates, and the ability to play user-generated content. You only need to apply for a free CD key. Users of this version can also play against the owners of the original game.

name: Pulstar
description: A twin-stick style arcade shooter.
